question: Which of the following was the first Yuezhi chief to lay the foundation of the Kushana Empire in India?
explanation: The Kushanas who were also called Guishuang in various Chinese texts and were one of the five tribes of Yueh-Chi or Yuezhi. Kujula Kadphises was the first Yueh Chi chief who crossed the Hindukush Mountains and founded the Kushana Empire.
